column4: I am seeking recommendations for ideas to expand the userbase and promote the use of Linux and Ubuntu. I have a release party to plan in 350 hours, and still need a title.
yes, 350 hours. i'm having a rel party and i know almost everything i'm going to do but i need a good title for it, that involves the word lucid.
I think it's more of an offtopic issue, maybe you should try that channel
